dialogue: I bought a new phone. It was only $50 after rebate.
Let's see what the terms of the rebate...
You must pass five tests before your rebate will be authorized.
You must wait 30 days without losing or accidentally discarding the rebate forms, the receipt, and the box.
You must figure out which of the several unlabeled codes on the box is the real rebate code.
You must write that code into a space designed for a code half as long.
Dude, we spent it before you left the store.
